td.A: Model driven development of secure XML data warehouses: a case study
td.div:
Belén Vela,
Carlos Blanco,
Eduardo Fernández-Medina,
Esperanza Marcos
EDBT '10: Proceedings of the 2010 EDBT/ICDT Workshops

tr.td: Bibliometrics: Downloads (6 Weeks): 7, Downloads (12 Months): 7, Downloads (Overall): 7, Citation Count: 0

td.div:
Data Warehouses (DWs) are currently considered to be the cornerstone of Business Intelligence (BI) systems. Security is a key issue in DWs since the business information that they manage is crucial and highly sensitive, and should be carefully protected. ...
Keywords: MDA, XML, model driven development, secure XML data warehouse

div.p: In this paper, we propose a methodological approach for the model driven development of secure XML databases (DB). This proposal is within the framework of MIDAS, a model driven methodology for the development of Web Information Systems based on the ...
